Currently we need volunteers to fill out some categories on the
SamuraiWiki=
, so if anyone is interested come and sign up:
http://wiki.samurai-archives=
.com/

PLEASE READ THE HELP SECTIONS IF YOU ARE NOT FAMILIAR WITH EDITING
W=
IKI ARTICLES:
http://wiki.samurai-archives.com/index.php?title=3DSamuraiWik=
i:Help
People who contribute without reading the help sections consistently=

and always make a mess that the Admins have to take time formatting
and cl=
eaning up. Please save us the trouble and browse similar
articles to the on=
e you want to create so that we don't have to clean
up and reformat your ar=
ticle because you didn't follow the standards
and formats.

When you sign u=
p, if you do not contribute anything for a day or two,
you will find a veri=
fication box on your user page. If you do not
remove it within 15 days, you=
r account will be blocked as inactive and
a possible spam account.  If it i=
s blocked in error, email me, and I
will unblock it as soon as possible.  T=
his is only done to prevent
spam accounts. Once you remove the box from you=
r user page, or if you
contribute, you will be verified permanently.  If yo=
u don't think you
will contribute for a long time, or at all, don't create =
an account
until you are ready to contribute. You do not need to create an
=
account in order to read and browse articles.

Also, plagarism is absolutel=
y not tolerated, and sources must always
be cited.  Failure to do so may re=
sult in banning.

Here are some categories that need volunteers to create a=
rticles,
however any articles are always appreciated:

Fiction Books
http:/=
/wiki.samurai-archives.com/index.php?title=3DCategory:Fiction_Books
Includi=
ng Citation info, synopsis, and purchase links.

Bujutsu articles
http://wi=
ki.samurai-archives.com/index.php?title=3DCategory:Bujutsu
A lot of the art=
icles are small stubs and also need sources. If you
want to help out with t=
he Bujutsu articles, feel free to join the
"Bujutsu Task Force":
http://wik=
i.samurai-archives.com/index.php?title=3DSamuraiWiki:Bujutsu_task_force

Mo=
vies: 
http://wiki.samurai-archives.com/index.php?title=3DCategory:Movies
T=
here are tons of Samurai and historical movies out there that need to
be ad=
ded. Including info such as cast list, synopsis, crew list, etc.

Other sec=
tions that also need to be filled out are the Mythology
sections, including=
 dieties, folklore, and obake:
http://wiki.samurai-archives.com/index.php?t=
itle=3DCategory:Mythology

The largest categories so far (of course) mostly=
 deal with the sengoku
period, including:

Sengoku Period:
http://wiki.samu=
rai-archives.com/index.php?title=3DCategory:Sengoku_Period

Samurai:
http:/=
/wiki.samurai-archives.com/index.php?title=3DCategory:Samurai

://wiki.samurai-archives.com/index.php?title=3DCategory:Clans

ht=
tp://wiki.samurai-archives.com/index.php?title=3DCategory:Timeline

Battles=
:
http://wiki.samurai-archives.com/index.php?title=3DCategory:Battles

REME=
MBER:  You do not need to sign up as a user to READ articles, ONLY
to contr=
ibute.  Enjoy!!
